item.title: Thoughts on all-remote
item.description: Working in an all-remote company has always been an interesting thought exercise to me. Would it work for me? Would it work for the company? At what cost? Pluses Let’s settle on the positives first, starting with the big one: one could work with his pajamas all day! While this might not sound serious, it implies a couple of subtleties - the office is where you when it to be.
